snippet: With the funeral of the famous character a centerpiece of the episode, “Dallas” attracted 3.6 million viewers, well above this season’s average of 2.6 million.
abstract: With the funeral of the famous character a centerpiece of the episode, “Dallas” attracted 3.6 million viewers, well above this season’s average of 2.6 million.

headline.main: J.R. Ewing Funeral Brings Season-High Ratings to 'Dallas'
